column1: Visitation Family and friends will be received at the Amos Carvelli Funeral Home
column3: Nutter Fort on Tuesday from 4-8 PM. Services Funeral services will be held on Wednesday
column5: 2015 at 11:00 AM with Reverend Michael Richards presiding. Interment Interment will follow in the West Virginia National Cemetery where full military services will be accorded.
